Name: What TIME Is It
About the game: 'What time is it' the main way to play this game is to find all the ways to get the present time. Here you can see the classic scenes of egg and salute, the children tracking down the murderer, the man walking the dog, the assassin wearing a hood, the train with a bomb and so on. Here, they are no longer the protagonist, but you are the God who holds time and space in one hand. game features 路Familiar faces 路 Easter egg everywhere 路Wulitou's way of customs clearance 路Easy to play In the game, you can change the experience of each era, play the Master Assassin to obtain time in the middle ages, play the primitive man to obtain the method of time, or play an ordinary man. The content of the game contains single line task system, beautiful music and funny plot how to play the game There are many levels and scenes in the game. After completing the game, you can unlock the next scene. Bustling railway stations, dark rooms, villages at night and so on. Players can find the time according to the clues in the map. open level Chapter 1 1-5 (teaching level and multi scene) Chapter 2 1-5 (platform and train) Chapter 3 1-5 (Master Assassin level)
